summary: "I Am Legend" is a 2007 action thriller starring Will Smith as Robert Neville, a virologist who's immune to a virus that turned most people into mutants. Set in a post-apocalyptic New York City, Neville works to find a cure while surviving attacks from the nocturnal creatures. Based on Richard Matheson's novel, the film was a box office hit, earning over $585 million. It received positive reviews for Smith's performance but was criticized for changing key elements from the book, especially the ending. A sequel is in the works with Smith returning.
title: I Am Legend (film)
